artist: Artist: Yamaguchi Chikuin; Artist: Seisanjin; Artist: Hiroshi; Artist: Chikutaku; Artist: Bansui
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs George Haldeman
description: accordion album with brown silk cover and Japanese label at L; contains images of landscapes and some calligraphy entries
markings: mark ULC of front cover in red pen: [1117]; R side of pages, brown ink: [five painters 1916-1919]; inside front cover, in pencil: [Chikutaku--Giant boulder / Seisanjin--Landscape with hut / Hiroshi--Landscape with waterfall / 竹陰 Chikuin--Lake scene / 晩翠 Bansui--Landscape Mi Fei style / Dated 1916-1919]; inside front cover, URC in red pen: [1117]; various seals throughout; Addiss label URC front cover: [AS 61 / Chikuin etc. / Landscape Album]
title: Landscape Album
